import React, { useState } from 'react' import { FaBars,FaSignInAlt} from 'react-icons/fa' import { social } from '../data' import logo from '../logo3.svg' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' const Navbar = () => { const [top,setTop] = React.useState(true); const [showLinks,setShowLinks] = useState(false); React.useEffect(()=>{ const event = window.addEventListener('scroll',()=>{ if(window.scrollY<=1) setTop(true) else setTop(false); }) return ()=> window.removeEventListener('scroll',event); },[]) return (
  • {setShowLinks(!showLinks)}}>Home
  • {setShowLinks(!showLinks)}}>Books
  • {setShowLinks(!showLinks)}}>About
  • {setShowLinks(!showLinks)}}>Contact
    {social.map((ico)=>{ return
  • {ico.id !==4 ? ({ico.icon}) : ({ico.icon}) }
    • })}
) } export default Navbar
